Please maximize your browser for using this application.

This study is a comparative assessment of Circular (CE), Green (GE), and Bio-Economy (BE) strategies.{br}{br}Please note: This is {strong}STILL{/strong} just a demo and the data will only be stored for testing purposes.

We are interested in your attitude towards the potential of Circular (CE), Green (GE), and Bio-Economy (BE) strategies to facilitate sustainability transformations.{br}{br}Please maximize your browser window and click on the continue-button to start the survey.

We will propose 36 statements about potential strategic activities regarding sustainability transformations. {br}{br} Split them up into three piles based on the level of your agreement regarding which {strong}activities should (not) be pursued for a successful sustainability transformation{/strong}.{br} You can either disagree, be neutral, or agree.{br}{br}Drag the cards into one of the three piles; alternatively press 1, 2 or 3 (disagree, neutral, agree) on your keyboard. You can make final changes later on.{br}{br}If you want to read this instruction a second time, press the help-button at the bottom right corner.

Take the cards from the "AGREEMENT"-pile and drag them into the right side of the score sheet according to your level of agreement.{br}{br}Then place the cards from the "DISAGREEMENT"-pile into left hand side according to the degree of your disagreement.{br}{br}Finally, place the cards from the "NEUTRAL"-pile in the middle part of of the score sheet.{br}{br}To read the full statement after having placed it in the score sheet, hover the mouse pointer over the statement.
Now you have placed all 36 statement cards on the score sheet. You can check the distribution once more and shift cards until you are satisfied.

Please explain why you agree most or disagree most with the following statements on sustainability transformation activities. These are the statements which you have placed at the extreme ends of the score sheet.
Finally, please answer the following information regarding your background.
